pages.contacts: TrekGear - Contact Us About us Our products Contacts Contact Us +91-751-0196147 trekgear@gmail.com Get in Touch with TrekGear We're Here to Help with All Your Trekking Needs 34/1000, Old NH 47, Edappally Junction, Nethaji Nagar, Edappally, Kochi, Ernakulam, Kerala 682024, India trekgear@gmail.com Monday to Friday: 9 AM - 5 PM +91-751-0196147 Quality Gear for Every Adventure TrekGear has been providing top-notch trekking equipment to adventurers across India. Our mission is to ensure you have everything you need for a safe and enjoyable journey. We also offer free shipping on all orders, ensuring that your gear arrives quickly and without extra cost. Our customer service team is always ready to assist you with any queries or advice on choosing the right equipment. At TrekGear, we are dedicated to supporting your adventures with the highest quality products and exceptional service. Our Products At TrekGear, we are passionate about the great outdoors and committed to equipping you with the best gear for your adventures. Founded in 2020, our company has quickly become a trusted name in the trekking community in India. We understand the diverse and challenging terrains our customers face, from the rugged Himalayas to the dense forests of the Western Ghats. This is why we offer a comprehensive range of products designed to meet the highest standards of durability, functionality, and comfort. Our product lineup includes everything a trekker might need: Backpacks Tents Sleeping Bags Trekking Poles Footwear Apparel Cooking Gear Navigation Tools Contact us right now I accept Privacy policy Home Contacts Privacy policy Terms of Use
pages.index: TrekGear - Your One-Stop Shop for Outdoor Gear in India About us Our products Contacts Contact Us +91-751-0196147 trekgear@gmail.com Explore the Best Trekking Gear in India Equip Yourself for Adventure with TrekGear Our Founders Rajesh Patel Rajesh Patel, an avid trekker with over 20 years of experience, founded TrekGear with a passion for adventure and a mission to provide top-quality equipment to fellow enthusiasts. Rajesh has scaled some of the most challenging peaks in the Himalayas and understands the importance of reliable gear. His vision for TrekGear is to make trekking accessible and enjoyable for everyone in India, ensuring that every customer is equipped with the best tools for their journeys. Anil Kapoor Anil Kapoor, a seasoned mountaineer and outdoor enthusiast, joined Rajesh to bring his extensive expertise in high-altitude gear to TrekGear. With a background in engineering and a deep love for the mountains, Anil has been instrumental in designing and sourcing equipment that can withstand the harshest conditions. Together with Rajesh, Anil is committed to ensuring that TrekGear offers products that meet the highest standards of safety and performance, empowering trekkers to conquer any terrain. About TrekGear TrekGear is India's premier destination for top-quality trekking equipment. Established with the mission to empower adventurers, we offer a wide range of gear tailored to the diverse terrains of India. Our commitment to quality and innovation has made us a trusted name among trekking enthusiasts. From the peaks of the Himalayas to the rugged trails of the Western Ghats, TrekGear provides equipment that ensures safety, durability, and comfort. Our products are rigorously tested to withstand the harshest conditions, giving you peace of mind on your adventures. Learn More Our Mission TrekGear is dedicated to making trekking accessible to all. We strive to offer high-quality gear at competitive prices, ensuring that everyone can explore the great outdoors with confidence. Our Commitment We prioritize customer satisfaction above all. Our team is always ready to assist you with expert advice and support, ensuring you have the best experience with our products. Our Achievements TrekGear has been recognized for its excellence in the outdoor equipment market. Our innovative products and customer-centric approach have earned us numerous accolades and a loyal customer base across India. Our products FAQs What types of trekking gear do you offer? We offer a wide range of trekking gear including backpacks, tents, sleeping bags, trekking poles, footwear, and apparel. All our products are designed to meet the highest standards of quality and durability. How do I choose the right equipment for my trek? Choosing the right equipment depends on the type and duration of your trek. Our website offers detailed product descriptions and reviews to help you make an informed decision. You can also contact our customer service for personalized recommendations. Do you offer international shipping? Currently, we ship only within India. However, we are working on expanding our shipping options to include international destinations. Stay tuned for updates on our website. Home Contacts Privacy policy Terms of Use
pages.privacy: TrekGear Privacy Policy About us Our products Contacts Contact Us +91-751-0196147 trekgear@gmail.com Privacy Policy Welcome to the Privacy Policy of TrekGear. Your privacy is of utmost importance to us, and we are committed to protecting it in every possible way. When you visit our website, we may collect certain information to improve your browsing experience and provide you with relevant products and services. Rest assured, we handle your data with the utmost care and respect for your privacy rights. Information Collection and Use When you visit our website, we may collect both personally identifiable information and non-personally identifiable information. Personally identifiable information may include your name, email address, phone number, and postal address. Non-personally identifiable information may include your IP address, browser type, operating system, and other technical details. How We Use Your Information We use the information we collect to provide you with the best possible service, improve our website and offerings, communicate with you, and personalize your experience. Your information may also be used for internal research, analysis, and marketing purposes. Providing and maintaining our website Responding to your inquiries or requests Improving our products and services Conducting research and analysis Communicating with you Information Sharing and Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personally identifiable information to third parties without your consent. However, we may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you. Data Security We take data security seriously and implement a variety of security measures to protect your personal information. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Changes to This Privacy Policy We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates or changes. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please don't hesitate to contact us at trekgear@gmail.com. Your privacy matters to us, and we're here to address any inquiries you may have. Home Contacts Privacy policy Terms of Use
